meanings.definition: To take an excessive amount of a substance, especially a drug.
meanings.sent1: She overdoes her medication and feels sick afterwards.
meanings.sent2: He always overdoes it with the sugar in his coffee.
meanings.sent3: He overdoes the salt in his soup every time, making it inedible.
meanings.sent4: She overdoes the perfume, making everyone around her sneeze.
meanings.sent5: The chef overdoes the spices in the curry, making it too spicy to eat.

meanings.definition: To do something to an excessive or harmful degree.
meanings.sent1: He overdoes his workouts and ends up injuring himself.
meanings.sent2: She overdoes the cleaning, making the house spotless.
meanings.sent3: He overdoes the jokes at the party, making everyone laugh non-stop.
meanings.sent4: She overdoes the compliments, making people suspicious of her intentions.
meanings.sent5: The actor overdoes his emotions in the scene, making it seem unrealistic.
